channel.title: Conferences on Agnès Pérez-Millan
channel.description: Recent content in Conferences on Agnès Pérez-Millan

item.title: XXVIII Reunió Anual Societat Catalana de Neurologia
item.description: AUTHORS: Agnès Pérez-Millan, Neus Falgàs, Beatriz Bosch, Uma Maria Lal-Trehan Estrada, Núria Guillén, Mircea Balasa, Albert Lladó, Roser Sala-Llonch, Raquel Sánchez-Valle TITLE: Asimetria cortical en individus en risc de patir malaltia d’Alzheimer CONFERENCE: XXVIII Reunió Anual Societat Catalana de Neurologia PLACE: Barcelona, Spain DATES: May 8 - 10, 2024

item.title: Down Syndrome associated Alzheimer disease (DSAD) and autosomal dominant AD (ADAD)

item.title: Down Syndrome associated Alzheimer disease (DSAD) and autosomal dominant AD (ADAD)
item.description: AUTHORS: Agnès Pérez-Millan, Sergi Borrego-Écija, Anna Antonell, Beatriz Bosch, Neus Falgàs, Núria Guillén, Jordi Juncà-Parella, Laura Molina-Porcel, Albert Lladó, Mircea Balasa, Antonio Boza-Serrano, Raquel Sánchez-Valle TITLE: Galectin-3 is upregulated and correlated with MRI findings in Autosomal Dominant Alzheimer’s Disease and Genetic Frontotemporal Dementia CONFERENCE: Down Syndrome associated Alzheimer disease (DSAD) and autosomal dominant AD (ADAD) PLACE: Barcelona, Spain DATES: April 11 - 12, 2024

item.title: VII Jornadas científicas de estudiantes de la SEB
item.description: AUTHORS: Agnès Pérez-Millan, Uma Maria Lal-Trehan Estrada, Neus Falgàs, Núria Guillén, Sergi Borrego-Écija, Beatriz Bosch, Jordi Juncà-Parella, Adrià Tort-Merino, Jordi Sarto, Josep Maria Augé, Anna Antonell, Núria Bargalló, Raquel Ruiz-García, Laura Naranjo, Mireca Balasa, Albert Lladó, Roser Sala Llonch, Raquel Sánchez-Valle TITLE: The Cortical Asymmetry Index (CAI) for subtyping frontotemporal dementia and Alzheimer’s disease patients CONFERENCE: VII Jornadas científicas de estudiantes de la SEB PLACE: Varcelona, Spain DATES: February 7 - 9, 2024

item.title: OHBM 2023 ANNUAL MEETING
item.description: MERIT POSTER AWARD AUTHORS: Agnès Pérez-Millan, Bertrand Thirion, Sergi Borrego‐Écija, José Contador, Jordi Juncà-Parella, Beatriz Bosch, Neus Falgàs, Anna Antonell, Mircea Balasa, Albert Lladó, Raquel Sanchez-Valle, Roser Sala-Llonch. TITLE: Probabilistic classification of Alzheimer’s Disease and Frontotemporal Dementia. CONFERENCE: OHBM 2023 ANNUAL MEETING PLACE: Montréal, Canada DATES: July 22 - 26, 2023

item.title: AAIC 2023
item.description: AUTHORS: Agnès Pérez-Millan, Núria Guillén, Neus Falgàs, María Ángeles Botí, Adrià Tort-Merino, Gema María Lledó-Ibáñez, Raquel Ruiz-García, Laura Naranjo, Lorena Rami, Mircea Balasa, Albert Lladó, Roser Sala-Llonch, Raquel Sanchez-Valle. TITLE: Exploring the relationship between MRI changes and cognitive/neuropsychiatric complaints in a cohort of long COVID-19 patients: A cross-sectional and longitudinal study. CONFERENCE: Alzheimer’s Association International Conference (AAIC) 2023 PLACE: Amsterdam, Netherlands DATES: July 16 - 20, 2023

item.title: AAIC 2023
item.description: AUTHORS: Núria Guillén, Agnès Pérez-Millan, Neus Falgàs, María Ángeles Botí, Adrià Tort-Merino, Gema María Lledó-Ibáñez, Raquel Ruiz-García, Laura Naranjo, Lorena Rami, Mircea Balasa, Roser Sala-Llonch, Albert Lladó, Raquel Sanchez-Valle. TITLE: Cognitive symptoms associated with COVID-19: neuropsychological and biochemical characterization. CONFERENCE: Alzheimer’s Association International Conference (AAIC) 2023 PLACE: Amsterdam, Netherlands DATES: July 16 - 20, 2023

item.title: AAIC 2023
item.description: AUTHORS: Agnès Pérez-Millan, Bertrand Thirion, Sergi Borrego‐Écija, José Contador, Jordi Juncà-Parella, Beatriz Bosch, Neus Falgàs, Anna Antonell, Raquel Ruiz-García, Laura Naranjo, Mircea Balasa, Albert Lladó,Roser Sala-Llonch, Raquel Sanchez-Valle. TITLE: Probabilistic computer-aided diagnosis of Alzheimer’s disease and frontotemporal dementia based on MRI and biochemical markers. CONFERENCE: Alzheimer’s Association International Conference (AAIC) 2023 PLACE: Amsterdam, Netherlands DATES: July 16 - 20, 2023

item.title: AAIC 2023
item.description: AUTHORS: Sergi Borrego Écija, Jordi Juncà-Parella, Raquel Ruiz-García, Jordi Sarto, Neus Falgàs, Diana Esteller, Núria Guillén, Agnès Pérez-Millan, Guadalupe Fernández, Yolanda González, Adrià Tort-Merino, Bea Bosch, Laura Fort-Aznar, Anna Antonell, Laura Naranjo, Albert Lladó, Mircea Balasa, Raquel Sanchez-Valle. TITLE: Plasma Nfl predicts neuroimaging alterations and functional decline in frontotemporal dementia. CONFERENCE: Alzheimer’s Association International Conference (AAIC) 2023 PLACE: Amsterdam, Netherlands DATES: July 16 - 20, 2023

item.title: 33rd International Symposium on ALS/MND
item.description: AUTHORS: Sergi Borrego-Écija, Agnès Pérez-Millan, John C van Swieten, Lize Jiskoot, Fermin Moreno, Robert Laforce, Caroline Graff, Mario Masellis, Maria Carmela Tartaglia, James B Rowe, Barbara Borroni, Elizabeth Finger, Matthis Synofzik, Daniela Galimberti, Rik Vandenberghe, Alexandre de Mendonça, Chris R Butler, Alexander Gerhard, Simon Ducharme, Isabelle Le Ber, Isabel Santana, Florence Pasquier, Johannes Levin, Markus Otto, Sandro Sorbi, Pietro Tiraboschi, Harro Seelaar, Tobias Langheinrich, Jonathan D Rohrer, Roser Sala-Llonch, Raquel Sánchez-Valle & The Genetic FTD Initiative, GENFI.

item.title: Emerging Topics in Artificial Intelligence (ETAI) 2022
item.description: AUTHORS: Agnès Pérez-Millan, Laia Borrell,José Contador,Mircea Balasa, Albert Lladó, Raquel Sanchez-Valle, Roser Sala-Llonch. TITLE: Classification between Early Onset Alzheimer’s disease and frontotemporal dementia using a single neuroimaging feature. CONFERENCE: Emerging Topics in Artificial Intelligence (ETAI) 2022 PLACE: San Diego, Unitated States of America DATES: August 21 - 25, 2022 ABSTRACT: INTRODUCTION: Early Onset Alzheimer’s Disease (EOAD) and Frontotemporal Dementia (FTD) are common forms of early-onset dementia. Therefore, there is a need to establish accurate diagnosis and to obtain markers for disease tracking.

item.title: OHBM 2022 ANNUAL MEETING
item.description: AUTHORS: Agnès Pérez-Millan, José Contador, Neus Falgàs, Núria Bargalló, Mircea Balasa, Albert Lladó, Raquel Sanchez-Valle, Roser Sala-Llonch. TITLE: Prognosis of Alzheimer’s Disease and Frontotemporal Dementia with a brain age model. CONFERENCE: OHBM 2022 ANNUAL MEETING PLACE: Glasgow, United Kingdom DATES: June 19 - 23, 2022 ABSTRACT: Introduction: Alzheimer Disease (AD) and Frontotemporal Dementia (FTD) are common forms of dementia, characterized by progressive brain atrophy at variable rates along the age continuum.

item.title: OHBM 2022 ANNUAL MEETING
item.description: AUTHORS: Uma Maria Lal-Trehan Estrada, Agnès Pérez-Millan, José Contador, Neus Falgàs, Núria Bargalló, Mircea Balasa, Albert Lladó, Raquel Sanchez-Valle, Roser Sala-Llonch. TITLE: Indices of cortical asymmetry in Alzheimer’s Disease and Frontotemporal Dementia. CONFERENCE: OHBM 2022 ANNUAL MEETING PLACE: Glasgow, United Kingdom DATES: June 19 - 23, 2022 ABSTRACT:

item.title: AD/PD 2022 International Conference on Alzheimer’s and Parkinson’s Diseases
item.description: AUTHORS: José Contador, Agnès Pérez-Millan, Nuria Guillen, Jordi Sarto, Adrià Tort-Merino, Jordi Juncà, Mircea Balasa, Neus Falgàs, Magdalena Castellví, Beatriz Bosch, Guadalupe Fernández-Villullas, Oscar Ramos-Campoy, Anna Antonell, Nuria Bargalló, Raquel Sanchez-Valle, Roser Sala-Llonch, Albert Lladó. TITLE: Sex Differences in Biomarkers and cognitive profile in early-onset Alzheimer’s disease. CONFERENCE: AD/PD 2022 International Conference on Alzheimer’s and Parkinson’s Diseases PLACE: Barcelona, Spain DATES: March 15 - 20, 2022

item.title: AD/PD 2022 International Conference on Alzheimer’s and Parkinson’s Diseases
item.description: AUTHORS: Agnès Pérez-Millan, José Contador, Neus Falgàs, Núria Bargalló, Mircea Balasa, Albert Lladó, Raquel Sanchez- Valle, Roser Sala-Llonch TITLE: Using age-matched templates to depict patterns of atrophy in AD and FTD. CONFERENCE: AD/PD 2022 International Conference on Alzheimer’s and Parkinson’s Diseases PLACE: Barcelona, Spain DATES: March 15 - 20, 2022 ABSTRACT: OBJECTIVES: Alzheimer Disease (AD) and Frontotemporal Dementia (FTD) are characterized by progressive brain atrophy at variable rates along the age continuum.

item.title: Jornada STEM: visibilitzem l’enginyeria
item.description: AUTHORS: Agnès Pérez-Millan, Laia Borrell, José Contador, Mircea Balasa, Albert Lladó, Raquel Sanchez-Valle, Roser Sala-Llonch. TITLE: Classificació entre la malaltia d’Alzheimer i la demència frontotemporal mitjançant una única característica de neuroimatge. CONFERENCE: Jornada STEM: visibilitzem l’enginyeria PLACE: Barcelona, Spain DATES: February 1, 2022

item.title: Emerging Topics in Artificial Intelligence (ETAI) 2021
item.description: AUTHORS: Agnès Pérez-Millan, José Contador, Aida Niñerola-Baizán, Raúl Tudela, Xavier Setoain, Albert Lladó, Raquel Sanchez-Valle, Roser Sala-Llonch, for the Alzheimer’s Disease Neuroimaging Initiative. TITLE: Statistical modelling of compromised longitudinal neuroimaging datasets: an application to alzheimer’s disease CONFERENCE: Emerging Topics in Artificial Intelligence (ETAI) 2021 PLACE: Virtual Event DATES: August 1 - 5, 2021 ABSTRACT: Large datasets of longitudinal data, made available for the neuroimage community, offer the possibility to study trajectories of biomarkers throughout the course of the diseases.

item.title: OHBM 2021 ANNUAL MEETING
item.description: AUTHORS: Agnès Pérez-Millan, José Contador, Adrià Tort, Sergi Borrego-Écija, Beatriz Bosch, Mircea Balasa, Bàrbara Segura, Gemma Monté-Rubio, Núria Bargalló, Albert Lladó, Raquel Sanchez-Valle, Roser Sala-Llonch. TITLE: Studying the effect of scanner change on measures of gray matter for Alzheimer’s disease studies. CONFERENCE: OHBM 2021 ANNUAL MEETING PLACE: Virtual Event DATES: June 21 - 25, 2021 ABSTRACT: INTRODUCTION: Longitudinal magnetic resonance imaging (MRI) studies allow the study of brain biomarkers during the course of neurological disorders such as Alzheimer’s disease (AD).

item.title: 2021 Annual Meeting of the ISMRM Iberian Chapter
item.description: AUTHORS: Agnès Pérez-Millan, Laia Borrell, José Contador, Mircea Balasa, Albert Lladó, Raquel Sanchez-Valle, Roser Sala-Llonch. TITLE: Classification between Alzheimer’s disease and frontotemporal dementia using a single neuroimaging feature. CONFERENCE: 2021 Annual Meeting of the ISMRM Iberian Chapter PLACE: Virtual Event DATES: June 16 - 17, 2021 ABSTRACT: INTRODUCTION: Alzheimer Disease (AD) and Frontotemporal Dementia (FTD) are common forms of early-onset dementia with different, but partly overlapping, symptoms and brain signatures. There is a need to establish accurate diagnosis and to obtain good markers for prognosis.

item.title: LXXII Reunión Anual de la Sociedad Española de Neurología
item.description: AUTHORS: José Contador, Roser Sala-Llonch, Agnès Pérez-Millan, Adrià Tort-Merino, Mircea Balasa, Neus Falgàs, Jaume Olives, Magdalena Castellví, Sergi Borrego-Écija, Beatriz Bosch, Guadalupe Fernández-Villullas, Oscar Ramos-Campoy, Anna Antonell, Raquel Sanchez-Valle i Albert Lladó. TITLE: Análisis transversal y longitudinal del patrón de atrofia en la enfermedad de Alzheimer de inicio precoz mediante RM-3T. CONFERENCE: LXXII Reunión Anual de la Sociedad Española de Neurología PLACE: Virtual Event DATES: November 23 - December 3, 2020

item.title: AAIC NEURO-SCIENCE NEXT 2020
item.description: AUTHORS: José Contador, Roser Sala-Llonch, Agnès Pérez-Millan, Adrià Tort-Merino, Mircea Balasa, Neus Falgàs Martínez, Jaume Olives, Magdalena Castellví, Sergi Borrego-Écija, Beatriz Bosch, Guadalupe Fernández- Villullas, Oscar Ramos-Campoy,Anna Antonell, Raquel Sanchez-Valle and Albert Lladó. TITLE: Cross-sectional and longitudinal analysis of the atrophy pattern in early-onset Alzheimer’s disease using 3T-MRI. CONFERENCE: AAIC NEURO-SCIENCE NEXT 2020 PLACE: Virtual Event DATES: November 9-10, 2020

item.title: XXIV Reunió Anual de la Societat Catalana de Neurologia
item.description: AUTHORS: José Contador, Roser Sala-Llonch, Agnès Pérez-Millan, Adrià Tort-Merino, Mircea Balasa, Neus Falgàs, Jaume Olives, Magdalena Castellví, Sergi Borrego-Écija, Beatriz Bosch, Guadalupe Fernández-Villullas, Oscar Ramos-Campoy, Anna Antonell, Raquel Sanchez-Valle y Albert Lladó. TITLE: Anàlisi transversal i longitudinal del patró d’atròfia en la malaltia d’Alzheimer d’inici precoç mitjançant RM-3T. CONFERENCE: XXIV Reunió Anual de la Societat Catalana de Neurologia PLACE: Virtual Event DATES: September 28 - October 2, 2020

item.title: Alzheimer’s Association International Conference (AAIC) 2020
item.description: AUTHORS: R Sala-Llonch, J. Contador, A Pérez-Millan, N. Falgàs, M. Ruiz-Peris, R. A. Tort-Merino, M.Balasa, J. Olives, M. Castellví, J. Juncà, S. Borrego-Écija, B. Bosch, G. Fernández, O. Ramos-Campoy, A. Antonell, Sánchez-Valle and A. Lladó. TITLE: Functional network alterations in early-onset Alzheimer’s Disease studied with resting-state fMRI. CONFERENCE: Alzheimer’s Association International Conference (AAIC) 2020 PLACE: Virtual Event DATES: July 27-31, 2020

item.title: Alzheimer’s Association International Conference (AAIC) 2020
item.description: AUTHORS: José Contador, Roser Sala-Llonch, Agnès Pérez-Millan, Sergi Borrego-Écija, Mircea Balasa, Raquel Sánchez- Valle, Albert Lladó and Alzheimer’s disease Neuroimaging Initiative (ADNI). TITLE: MRI decline pattern in early onset MCI due to Alzheimer’s disease. CONFERENCE: Alzheimer’s Association International Conference (AAIC) 2020 PLACE: Virtual Event DATES: July 27-31, 2020.
